name: The Last 12 Hours
description:
The Last 12 Hours is a 3rd person shooter, where you have to kill zombies before they destroy your base. Balance your resources to survive all the waves. 

This is early access so I can gather feedback and improve other levels that are in development. I appreciate all support and feedback! 

The Future: 

  • Multiple Levels (Same Goal, Various ways to complete it)
  • Additional Weapons (Map Dependent. Ex; Grenades, Sniper, SMG,LMG)
  • Additional Mechanics (Different systems for healing barriers, new ways to earn money)
  • More Enemies (Explosive, Bullet Sponges, Etc;)

I aiming  to be able to fully release by September 1st, 2022
